Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Neferibra with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, there is a central column of incised Hieroglyphs running down the front of the body from between the hands to the feet; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
